field.name: form.title
field.label: Workspace Name
field.description: Examples: Colorado Federal Public Lands Strategy, Western State Trust Lands, Kenya's Biodiversity Mapping Project.

field.name: form.id
field.label: Web Site Address (up to 25 characters)
field.description: A shorter name is better for your web site address. Example: If your workspace is called Colorado Federal Public Lands, your web site address might be "copubliclands". The full URL for the workspace would then be http://conserveonline.org/workspaces/copubliclands.

field.name: form.description
field.label: What is the purpose, goal, or mission statement for your workspace? (up to 250 characters)
field.description: This description will appear on the home page of your workspace.

field.name: form.monitoring
field.label: Monitoring type
field.description: The methods used to determine whether the conservation actions described in this document are succeeding. Check all that apply.

field.name: form.organization
field.label: Organization
field.description: Examples: The Nature Conservancy, World Wildlife Fund, IUCN.

field.name: form.keywords
field.label: Other Search Terms
field.description: Examples: biodiversity, freshwater, Natural Heritage Programs, panthera. leo.

field.name: form.license
field.label: License
field.description: The default license, from the Creative Commons license set, for content in this workspace.

field.name: form.is_private
field.label: Is the workspace public or private?

value.option: Public, everyone can see content not made private.
Private, only workspace members can see content.
